description: Computes SVD of the matrix formed by the 1D file(s) and outputs the result on stdout.

vmean.title: Vmean flag
vmean.description: Remove mean from each vector (cannot be used with -one)

vnorm.title: Vnorm flag
vnorm.description: Make L2-norm of each vector = 1 before SVD

cond.title: Cond flag
cond.description: Only print condition number (ratio of extremes)

sort.title: Sort flag
sort.description: Sort singular values in descending order (default)

asort.title: Asort flag
asort.description: Sort singular values in ascending order

left_eigenvectors.title: Left eigenvectors flag
left_eigenvectors.description: Only output left eigenvectors in .1D format

num_eigenvectors.title: Number of Eigenvectors
num_eigenvectors.description: Specify number of left eigenvectors to output
